statements: SELECT lock_id, lock_name, entry_timestamp, exit_timestamp, user_id FROM smart_locks_status;
SELECT lock_name, entry_timestamp, exit_timestamp FROM smart_locks_status WHERE lock_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM smart_locks_status WHERE entry_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT lock_name, user_id FROM smart_locks_status ORDER BY entry_timestamp DESC;
SELECT lock_name, entry_timestamp, exit_timestamp FROM smart_locks_status WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY exit_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_locks_status WHERE lock_id = 1;
SELECT lock_name, entry_timestamp FROM smart_locks_status WHERE entry_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT lock_id, lock_name, entry_timestamp FROM smart_locks_status ORDER BY entry_timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_entries FROM smart_locks_status GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_entries > 1;
SELECT * FROM smart_locks_status WHERE entry_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY exit_timestamp;
SELECT * FROM smart_locks;
SELECT lock_name, lock_location FROM smart_locks;
SELECT lock_id, lock_name, lock_status FROM smart_locks WHERE lock_status='Active';
SELECT lock_id, lock_name, entry_time FROM smart_locks ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT lock_name, access_time, user_id, access_type FROM lock_access_logs WHERE access_type='Granted' ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_locks WHERE lock_location = 'Home' ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT lock_name, lock_location FROM smart_locks WHERE lock_status = 'Active';
SELECT lock_id, lock_location, entry_time FROM smart_locks WHERE lock_name LIKE '%Main%';
SELECT lock_name, lock_status FROM smart_locks WHERE entry_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY entry_time;
SELECT lock_id, access_time, user_id, access_type FROM lock_access_logs WHERE access_type = 'Admin' ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_locks
SELECT lock_id, lock_name FROM smart_locks ORDER BY lock_name ASC
SELECT owner_name, entry_log FROM smart_locks WHERE owner_name = 'Alice'
SELECT access_id, lock_id, user_id FROM lock_access WHERE access_type = 'admin' ORDER BY access_timestamp DESC
SELECT username, email, avatar_url FROM user_profiles
SELECT * FROM smart_locks;
SELECT owner_name, lock_name FROM smart_locks ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT lock_name, owner_name, entry_log FROM smart_locks WHERE entry_log >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, access_type, access_timestamp FROM lock_access WHERE access_type = 'admin' ORDER BY access_timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT lock_id, lock_name, lock_location FROM SmartLocks;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, user_id, lock_id, access_time FROM AccessLogs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Security';
SELECT * FROM SmartLocks;
SELECT lock_id, lock_name FROM SmartLocks WHERE lock_location = 'Main Entrance';
SELECT lock_name, lock_location FROM SmartLocks ORDER BY lock_name DESC;
SELECT Users.user_name, SmartLocks.lock_name FROM Users INNER JOIN SmartLocks ON Users.user_id = 1 AND SmartLocks.lock_id = 2;
SELECT SmartLocks.lock_name, AccessLogs.access_time FROM SmartLocks JOIN AccessLogs ON SmartLocks.lock_id = AccessLogs.lock_id ORDER BY AccessLogs.access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT lock_name, lock_location FROM smart_locks;
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_role FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM lock_events WHERE event_type = 'unlock' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT lock_name, is_locked FROM smart_locks WHERE is_locked = true;
SELECT * FROM smart_locks;
SELECT lock_name, lock_location FROM smart_locks WHERE is_locked = true;
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_role FROM users ORDER BY user_role DESC;
SELECT lock_name, event_type, event_timestamp FROM smart_locks JOIN lock_events ON smart_locks.lock_id = lock_events.lock_id;
SELECT lock_name, alert_type, alert_description FROM smart_locks JOIN alerts ON smart_locks.lock_id = alerts.lock_id WHERE alert_timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
